content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"While our teams were initially based mostly in Eastern Europe – specifically Ukraine and Belarus – we have diversified extensively in 2022 and now how employees in 20 countries around the world.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":148999,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/281d0c29-07c6-4c20-9c03-b6730ebebae0/Capture.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/281d0c29-07c6-4c20-9c03-b6730ebebae0/Capture.PNG?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"Capture.PNG\",\"name\":\"Capture.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"281d0c29-07c6-4c20-9c03-b6730ebebae0\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":1029.02783203125,\"height\":539.744020478738},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
